data.lyric:
[ti:Smile (Living My Best Life)]
[ar:Lil Duval/Snoop Dogg/Ball Greezy]
[al:Smile (Living My Best Life)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Smile (Living My Best Life) - Lil Duval/Snoop Dogg (史努比狗狗)/Ball Greezy
[00:26.09]We gon' start this thing off right
[00:28.13]Duval in the motherf**kin' house c'mon c'mon
[00:31.64]Do it baby stick it baby
[00:34.49]Do it baby stick it baby
[00:36.91]Do it baby stick it baby
[00:39.18]Do it baby stick it baby
[00:40.82]I'm living my best life
[00:42.76]Ain't goin' back and forth with you n***as
[00:44.96]I'm living my best life
[00:47.52]Ain't goin' back and forth with you n***as
[00:49.71]I'm living my best life
[00:52.20]Ain't goin' back and forth with you n***as
[00:54.53]I'm living my best life
[00:57.04]Ain't goin' back and forth with you n***as
[01:01.08]You got a lot to be smilin' for smile b***h
[01:03.81]Smile b***h c'mon
[01:05.92]So what the f**k you be wylin' for smile b***h smile b***h
[01:09.63]Come on I get my grin on
[01:12.35]I'm smiling b***h 'cause I always get my win on
[01:14.70]I been on so many different stages
[01:16.70]Graced the cover of a hundred magazine pages
[01:19.24]Made people smile everywhere that I went
[01:21.61]I even put it on the first Black President
[01:23.90]It's evident I'm hot as a Crock-Pot
[01:26.27]With a big-a*s smile like Mr Hot Spot
[01:29.82]You got a lot to be smilin' for
[01:32.49]Smile b***h smile b***h c'mon

[01:36.81]Smile b***h smile b***h c'mon
[01:39.45]If you're breathin' you achievin'

[02:20.55]More trips new chicks with no drawers
[02:22.88]More dranks more smoke and more cars
[02:25.29]More shows with Duval and Snoop Dogg
[02:27.66]Look I ain't tryna throw no shade
[02:29.92]'Cause I can't see 'em in my lane
[02:32.36]As long as my rent gettin' paid
[02:34.72]I can care less what a b***h think huh
